rules_text:
Create a 1/1 blue and red Horror creature token with “Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature”. Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
[i]Otherworld[/i] – As long as an opponent has been burdened three or more times and this card is in your graveyard, it has flashback {U}{U}{R}{R} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
